hero.title: Crafting Creative Content
hero.subtitle: Ready to dive into my world?
hero.alt: Creative content creator specializing in graphic design, web design, and social media strategies.

small_description.title: A little bit about me
small_description.intro: Hello there, nice to meet you! I'm Cara, a graphic designer, web designer and content creator from Beringen. My passion? Creating strong visual identities and building websites that are both beautiful and functional.
small_description.middle: With a background in cross-media design and a love for branding, web design & content creation, I help businesses stand out online. I design user-friendly websites, powerful brand identities and creative visual content.
small_description.outro: When I’m not behind my laptop, you’ll probably find me on my motorcycle: always on the lookout for new inspiration!

featured_projects.title: Selected projects
featured_projects.subtitle: Take a dive in and discover how I bring visions to life.

featured_blogs.title: Latest from the blog
featured_blogs.subtitle: Turning creative adventures into inspiring stories: discover my insights on design, social media, creativity and digital innovation.

contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.subtitle: Excited? Let's talk!
contact.hero_alt: Get in touch for creative solutions in content creation, graphic design, and web design.
contact.note: Have an idea? A question? Or just want to chat about design, creativity, or motorcycles? Whether it's a quick hello or a deep dive into creative projects, I’d love to hear from you. Let’s connect!

expertise.title: Expertise
expertise.subtitle: Discover how I can support your brand
expertise.description: What can I do for you?
expertise.hero_alt: Expertise in content creation, graphic design, and web design across various sectors.
expertise.intro: From a low-maintenance website and a recognisable visual identity to a smart content strategy: I help you tell your brand’s story in a way that’s clear, creative and compelling. Below, you'll discover how I support brands through web design, branding, content creation and strategic planning.
expertise.grid_intro: No one-size-fits-all solutions here, just four areas where I can truly make a difference. With the right tools and a healthy dose of creative energy.

web.title: Web design, development & maintenance
web.description: From wireframes to fully functional websites: I design responsive, user-friendly platforms using tools like WordPress and Drupal with SEO in mind. I also have experience working with React.

branding.title: Branding & graphic design
branding.description: Design that tells a story. From logos and business cards to flyers and campaign visuals: I help brands express who they are through strong visual identities.

content.title: Content creation, social media & community management
content.description: I create strategies and visual content that connect. From Instagram reels to ad campaigns and community interaction: I help brands engage their audience online.

strategy.title: Strategy & marketing planning
strategy.description: From idea to execution. I translate business goals into creative strategies, detailed content calendars and campaigns that get things moving.
